name: laravel-react-modular-stack
description: All scripts are executed with `bun`, not `npm`, `yarn` or `pnpm`. (bun run <script>).

scripts.i:all: bun i && bun run i:be && bun run i:fe
scripts.dev: concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74" "bun run dev:be" "bun run queue:listen" "bun run dev:fe" --names='SERVER,QUEUE,CLIENT'
scripts.↓: # Ejecuta cualquier comando de `php artisan` dentro de `backend`
scripts.dev:be: bun run ziggy && dotenv -e .env.local -- php backend/artisan serve --host=localhost --port=8080
scripts.clear:all: dotenv -e .env.local -- php backend/artisan cache:clear && dotenv -e .env.local -- php backend/artisan config:clear && dotenv -e .env.local -- php backend/artisan event:clear && dotenv -e .env.local -- php backend/artisan optimize:clear && dotenv -e .env.local -- php backend/artisan route:clear && dotenv -e .env.local -- php backend/artisan view:clear && cd backend && composer dump-autoload -o
scripts.↓↓: # Inicia el servidor de Vite en el HOST, pero usando las variables de .env.docker para que se conecte a la URL correcta.
scripts.↓↓↓: # Inicia los contenedores en primer plano para ver los logs en la misma terminal que dk:dev.
scripts.dk:seed:users: docker-compose --env-file .env.docker run --rm -v ./.env.users:/var/www/backend/.env.users backend php artisan db:seed --class=SystemUsersSeeder
scripts.pg:dev: concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74" "bun run pg:dev:be" "bun run pg:queue:listen" "bun run dev:fe" --names='SERVER,QUEUE,CLIENT'
scripts.pg:dev:be: bun run pg:ziggy && dotenv -e .env.pg.local -- php backend/artisan serve --host=localhost --port=8080
